question_text:
Question 23
                       
 
 
A vertical shaft Francis turbine rotates at 300 rpm. The available head at the inlet to the turbine is 200 m. 
The tip speed of the rotor is 40 m/s. Water leaves the runner of the turbine without whirl. Velocity at the 
exit of the draft tube is 3.5 m/s. The head losses in different components of the turbine are : (i) stator and 
guide vanes: 5.0 m,  (ii) Rotor: 10 m, and (iii) Draft tube: 2 m. Flow rate through the turbine is 20 m
3
/s. 
Take 
2
9.8 m/s
g
 =
. The hydraulic efficiency of the turbine is ________ % (round off to one decimal
place).
Hydraulic Machinery (Turbine) 
 
Ans. 
93.43
